steps.text:
Case records of the Massachusetts General Hospital. Case 29-2013. A 32-year-old 
HIV-positive African man with dyspnea and skin lesions.
Friedland GH(1), Naidoo P, Abdool-Gafoor B, Moosa MY, Ramdial PK, Gandhi RT.

Author information:
(1)AIDS Program, Yale–New Haven Hospital, and Department of Medicine, Yale 
University School of Medicine, New Haven, CT, USA.
